questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I work every day to a peaceful, happy aud fulfilling
With a watchfull eyes for me and my entourage
Tolerance in line with my values, my beliefs and those of others
I am convinced of the goodness ef the human being even sometimes he shows something else
my willbe that I want with family, friend, learn, meet other people
I IMAGINE and i believe in this word ..."you may said I'm a dreamer but i'not the only one...."
